  • Method Details

    • start

      protected void start​(int port)
      Starts servers according to a certain port given in parameter.
      Parameters:
      port - int port.

    • handleGETRequest

      private void handleGETRequest​(java.net.Socket remote, java.io.PrintWriter out, java.lang.String resource, java.lang.String httpVersion)
      Handles GET Request with a remote socket, a writer, the resource to get, and http Version. Transmits requested file's content.
      Parameters:
      remote - Remote socket.
      out - PrintWriter
      resource - Resource to get.
      httpVersion - String.

    • handleHEADRequest

      private void handleHEADRequest​(java.net.Socket remote, java.io.PrintWriter out, java.lang.String resource, java.lang.String httpVersion)
      Handles HEADER Request with a remote socket, a writer, the resource to get, and http Version. Transmits header of requested file.
      Parameters:
      remote - Remote socket.
      out - PrintWriter
      resource - Resource to get.
      httpVersion - String.

    • handlePOSTRequest

      private void handlePOSTRequest​(java.net.Socket remote, java.io.PrintWriter out, java.lang.String resource, java.lang.String httpVersion)
      Handles POST Request with a remote socket, a writer, the resource to get, and http Version. Appends to a given file what is given as a body of the request.
      Parameters:
      remote - Remote socket.
      out - PrintWriter
      resource - Resource to get.
      httpVersion - String.

    • handleDELETERequest

      private void handleDELETERequest​(java.io.PrintWriter out, java.lang.String resource, java.lang.String httpVersion)
      Handles DELETE Request with a writer, the resource to get, and http Version. Deletes a given file.
      Parameters:
      out - PrintWriter
      resource - Resource to get.
      httpVersion - String.

    • handlePUTRequest

      private void handlePUTRequest​(java.net.Socket remote, java.io.PrintWriter out, java.lang.String resource, java.lang.String httpVersion)
      Handles PUT Request with a remote socket, a writer, the resource to get, and http Version. Writes to a given file what is given as a body of the request.
      Parameters:
      remote - Remote socket.
      out - PrintWriter
      resource - Resource to get.
      httpVersion - String.

    • handleNotImplemented

      private void handleNotImplemented​(java.io.PrintWriter out, java.lang.String httpVersion, java.lang.String method)
      Function for 501 response.
      Parameters:
      out - PrintWriter
      httpVersion - String.
      method - String.
